## Which countries have been more involved in MID over time?

```{r}
mid_participant %>% 
  select(styear, stabb) %>% 
  add_count(stabb) %>% 
  filter(styear > 1900, n > 150) %>% 
  group_by(styear = 10 * (styear %/% 10)) %>% 
  count(stabb) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = styear, y = nn)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~ stabb) + 
  labs(title = "Conflict-stricken countries over time", 
       x = "Year", 
       y = "# of MIDs")
```
